name: EyeTV Recording Metadata File
summary: Learn about .EYETVP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The EYETVP file is contained within an EYETVP file, which is similar to a Mac OS X .PKG file. To view the contents of the EYETV recording file and access the EYETVP file, right-click the file and select Show Package Contents.

The EyeTV software is only compatible with OS X and iOS although Elgato develops peripherals that are available for Windows and Android devices. Product availability depends on the country in which you reside.
NOTE: Geniatech acquired EyeTV from Elgato in February 2016.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
